wiki.content:
There are two Madonna songs with the name "Forbidden Love". The first appeared on her 1994 album Bedtime Stories; the second appeared on her 2005 album Confessions on a Dance Floor.
 The two songs are completely different musically, lyrically and thematically. The 1994 song is a pop/R&B ballad while the 2005 song is an uptempo dance track. Both songs are, interestingly, the seventh tracks on their respective albums.
 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.

comments: There is no excuse for 2 songs by the same artist with the same title. NONE. +1
